apps.name: WeatherVue
apps.description: A modern Vue app, using OpenWeather API to display a 5-day forcast for specified location.

apps.name: Armstrong Realty
apps.description: Real Estate template website, using Vue and Random User Generator API to create fictional Realtors.

apps.name: Palindrome
apps.description: A simple JavaScript app that determines if a word is a palindrome. Wrapped elegantly into a web app using Bootstrap.

apps.name: jsPixel
apps.description: A JavaScript web app, that allows you to create pixel art with a basic color pallete.

apps.name: Tribute
apps.description: A sample tribute page, created only using HTML and Boostrap.

apps.name: rot13
apps.description: Created using pure JavaScript. ROT13 is a cipher that take a phrase and shifts all letters by 13.

apps.name: Vue Todo
apps.description: CRUD(Create, read, update, delete) vue app, which maintains a todo list. Features a completed list.
